description: System-generated unique identifier for this contact-to-contact_type assignment; serves as the primary key for the row.
Identifier of the contact linked in this record; foreign key to the contact master.
Code identifying the contact’s category or role (e.g., driver, vendor); likely references a lookup table; confirm with SME.
System timestamp when this mapping row was last updated in the database.
Audit field capturing when a user last changed the row; naming suggests a user identifier, but values look like timestamps—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that created this mapping record.
Timestamp when the record was initially created by a user or process.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record, distinct from system last_modified if both exist.
